description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS file, and the main App component. It initializes the React root and renders the App component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root object to manage rendering in the DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM managed by the root.
